attributes.action: Make Inclusion, Diversity and Equality a module in the National Curriculum
attributes.additional_details: With the rise of Social Media comes the rise of Trolling and Online Abuse and until stricter rules and laws are put into place regarding this people from minority groups are being targeted both online and offline. If children were taught as part of a module in the Nation Curriculum how to behave both online and offline and the importance of Inclusion, Diversity and Equality we could see a huge stop to the abuse so many people are suffering.
attributes.background: In an ever increasing diverse nation the overwhelming rise in Homophobic, Racist, and abuse towards minority groups and people with disabilities is terrifying. This is both online and offline, if children were to be taught about Inclusion, Diversity and Equality at school we could help to stop this.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323808
